name: Kingdom Kids
description:
Kingdom Kids is a simple Platformer/ exploration game, where you choose 1 of the 6 Kingdom Kids and look for 20 lost Kingdom Kids.

Based on the Bible Verse:

As arrows are in the hand of a mighty man; so are children of the youth. Psalm 127:4

Objective:

Find the 20 Missing Kingdom Kids

Controls: (Game has partial controller support, everything but character select screen can be controlled with a controller)

(keyboard or XBOX controller):

  • Walk: Arrow keys or XBOX Left Thumb;
  • Run: Hold "Z" key or XBOX "X";
  • Jump: Press "X" key or XBOX "A";
  • Crouch/Crawl: Hold "F" key or XBOX Left Trigger;
  • Spin Attack: Press "V" key or XBOX Right Trigger;
  • Pause: Press ESC or XBOX Start.
  • Left Button /Right Button (XBOX Controller) Move on Level Select Screen

Tips & Hints!

Avoid the hazards such as fires from gas leaks, stinky sewer gas!

Slime enemies can either be defeated by jumping on them or spin attacking them!

Follow the onscreen arrows to find the missing Kingdom Kids!

Arrows will turn into Diamonds once a Missing Kid is onscreen!
